name: Kanji Chaos
description:
Very Early Demo, only one stage is available right now, when you reach an endless pit and can't proceed further, you're reached the end of the current demo.

Title screen not in game and isn't final.

A 2D Platformer made entirely out of Kanji.

Game made in Godot Engine
License: godotengine.org/license

Controls

Left and Right Arrow Keys- Move left and right

Up Arrow Key- Jump

Kanji

人- Person, you the player

草- Grass

土- Ground

死- Death

敵- Enemy

生- Life

心- Hearts for health (not implemented yet)

車- Car

Other Kanji are in the instructions and may not be available or work right now.

There will likely be some glitches I don't know about since I'm new at Godot.
